issue.title: yii\filters\ContentNegotiator violates HTTP 1.1 spec

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
Upon a failed negotiation `ContentNegotiator` generates `415 Unsupported Media Type` response. According to HTTP 1.1 standard the `406 Not Acceptable` response should be generated instead:

https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-5.3.2
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-5.3.5
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-6.5.6
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-6.5.13

Also, the description for `406 Not Acceptable` HTTP status code generated by `ContentNegotiator` is incorrect:

`None of your requested content types is supported.`

should be 

`None of your requested media types is supported.`

instead (there is no such thing as `content type`, there is only a `media type` and a `Content-Type` header that specifies the media type of response).

body: @samdark I think this needs to be reopened. The fix never got committed to the correct branch.

issue.title: Fix #12539: `yii\filters\ContentNegotiator` now generates 406 'Not Acceptable' instead of 415 'Unsupported Media Type' on content-type negotiation fail

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
